name: Raster Attack!
description:
WARNING: PLAY IN CHROMIUM BASED BROWSERS (CHROME, BRAVE, OGX)

RASTER ATTACK: HOW TO PLAY

A and D to move counter-clockwise and clockwise!

P to pause the game!

SURVIVE FOR AS LONG AS YOU CAN!

AVOID THE PROJECTILES!

HEALTH REGENERATES OVER TIME!

THERE ARE CHECKPOINTS TO ASSIST YOU ALONG YOUR JOURNEY!

CREDITS

Zane Little - In-Game Music!

Made in two days during the fall semester of my senior year in university at NYU.
